response.original_title: Crewcut Number Three: A Cinematic Elegy to JLG in Nine Parts
response.overview: TO BE INTERRED OR NOT?An elegy? A reaction? Perhaps a tribute to the passing of one of the last masters of World Cinema Jean Luc Godard from a young emerging filmmaker who hails from the Southern part of the geographical center of the Far East where Christianity has taken its deepest root. Taking inspiration from the spectacular cinematic roadshows from Hollywood's Golden Age, this experimental documentary is both an observation and an elegyâ€” juxtaposing scenes of Davao City recovering from the pandemic with the musical landscapes ranging from the 1900s onwards that Monsieur Godard might have heard in his formative years into being a force to be reckoned with during his international cinematic superstardom.
response.title: Crewcut Number Three: A Cinematic Elegy to JLG in Nine Parts
